description: Just two kilometres from the Slovenian border as the crow flies, this restaurant with its dual influences serves top-quality cuisine rooted in the gastronomic traditions of this border region. In business since 1870 and now run by the four children from the sixth generation of the same family, Devetak is an absolute must for anyone visiting the Friuli region.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Interesting wine list', 'Terrace']
